title: The International Bad Boys Hour Ep 54: Cholos Try with Fabian Alamor and Rick Kosick
description: The boys are back in studio with another instant classic.  After a week of not doing stand up and getting rest Sam is on fire and Steve doesn't know how to handle it. Steve and Sam then discuss their vision boards and kicking ass.  They then welcome Big Brother and Jack Ass's Rick Kosick back to the studio. Sam and Rick discuss having a secret and the importance of doing as much weird shit as you can before you grow old.  The Bad Boys welcome pro skater, gang banger, porn star and youtube celebrity, Fabian Alomar, to the show.  Fabian discusses what it was like learning to skate board in East LA in the 80's and how he almost went jail with Germany's Tupac!  All of this and more on another exciting episode of The International Bad Boys Hour!
itunes:author: Sam Tripoli
